lender.name: Josh
lender.loan_because: Kiva entrepreneurs are at the forefront of their society’s growth and change. This is reason enough to support them in their endeavours.

lender.name: Pamela
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate to live my dream. Kiva lets me feel as though I am able to do something direct and concrete for people who need little in order to achieve their personal dreams and goals.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Certified Public Manager and Certified Arborist, and a physicist. I teach for Florida State University as well as for some private companies. I also do management consultation, and I grind stumps for my husband's tree service!

lender.name: WENDY
lender.loan_because: I like to help other people achieve , especially other women. I am honored to be able to help these people realize their dreams and improve their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I am a dairy farmer supplying milk to a local company which in turn supplies products locally and overseas. I enjoy working with animals and being a part of the community that supplies food to people of the world.

lender.name: John and Georgia
lender.loan_because: If my granddaughter Georgia continues what she and I have started together, some people, in all corners of the world, will have been given a chance to achieve their goals in life.

lender.name: Katie
lender.loan_because: it's a small way to extend a hand to someone across the world who needs it

lender.name: Terri
lender.loan_because: To promote peace in war-torn and conflict-prone areas. To assist young men and women in Muslim nations to believe in hope instead of Jihad.
lender.occupational_info: My work involves providing liquidity to lenders so that they can give loans to people that want to own their own home.

lender.name: Sue & James
lender.loan_because: We live in the "lucky" country and want to make a difference in a small way to other people who are less fortunate.

lender.name: Patricia
lender.loan_because: We women all need a kitchen a bit of glamour and men who make things happen.
lender.occupational_info: I am retired and live with my husband and son who is an artist, his website is below, and 2 dogs, Dennis and Nikki.

lender.name: ROBERT
lender.loan_because: I wish to provide much needed funding to assist individuals to commence or develop their business and/or ideas, thereby assisting them to reach their full potential.
lender.occupational_info: I purchase land and build homes to then sell to people. I also provide finance to people who wish to purchase these homes.

lender.name: Janet
lender.loan_because: it is a way to give back to others that are starting out or expanding their businesses.
lender.occupational_info: I am an advance practice nurse working in nursing homes taking care of elderly people.

lender.name: Alex
lender.loan_because: May the Force be with you
lender.occupational_info: alexander.oysta@hm-media.no

lender.name: Dries Bessels
lender.loan_because: I think this is a great way to help people improve their living.
lender.occupational_info: I help a company on how to use computers to get their work done in a secure way.

lender.name: BluTara
lender.loan_because: "Microfinance stands as one of the most promising and cost-effective tools in the fight against global poverty." Jonathan Morduch, Chair, UN Expert Group on Poverty Statistics
lender.occupational_info: social justice minded global citizen

lender.name: Cheryl
lender.loan_because: someone across the world will have opportunities that I have already had and, hopefully, it will make their lives more fulfilling and optimistic.
lender.occupational_info: Happily retired from high school teaching .Choose to be assistant to family members who require a little bit of extra help.

lender.name: Leone
lender.loan_because: It feels good to help people, who perhaps don't have a lot of opportunity-and Kiva allows us to do this in a small way!
lender.occupational_info: Earthmoving Contractors.

lender.name: Judith
lender.loan_because: Helping people become economically independent is a way to help build a stronger, more caring community.

lender.name: Sophia Tsai
lender.occupational_info: steel business

lender.name: Ryan
lender.loan_because: I want to give other people a chance for a better life.
lender.occupational_info: I am a high school student.

lender.name: Cees
lender.occupational_info: I like the concept of Kiva. It is such a simple and effective way of raising capital for MFIs

lender.name: Sheila
lender.loan_because: we all need to make the world a better place by helping our neighbours in whatever way we can
lender.occupational_info: I analyse crime problems and work out ways to help investigators solve them.

lender.name: Gianni & Norma
lender.loan_because: New Zealand

lender.name: Ninee
lender.loan_because: I believe the aggregation of individual actions can make a huge difference although each action may appear to be incrementally marginal. For any economy to prosper, especially in today's globally connected world, it needs to provide a solid foundation for its citizens to conduct profitable economic activities that create job opportunities for the rest of its citizens. Ultimately, the welfare of its citizen will improve as the economy expands from the growth of economic activities.

lender.name: tanya
lender.loan_because: what a great way to help people help themselves!

lender.name: khwanta
lender.loan_because: I would like to open small business about trading to buy parts of electronocs for sale but no money to open.
lender.occupational_info: purchasing import

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: It's about opportunity

lender.name: keith
lender.loan_because: I am a company manager, too. Therefore I want to support people challenging success for the business. Let's succeed together!

lender.name: Tim
lender.loan_because: I realize how lucky and well off I am compared with most people in the world, and I believe that a loan can make a huge difference to the lives of many people.

lender.name: Jas
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: Lover of God & people.

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because: It helps create a better world.
lender.occupational_info: Jason is currently unemployed looking for a change of career

lender.name: Marc & Scotty
lender.loan_because: We know how it feels to have not much money and we're happy to help entrepreneurs around the globe to build something for themselves and their families!
lender.occupational_info: We're an Internet Marketing Agency.

lender.name: Langlands, Forfar
lender.occupational_info: Primary School in Forfar, Scotland

lender.name: Pamela
lender.loan_because: We also have a grocery business and we know how hard it is to get started, I hope this helps get people going and independent.
lender.occupational_info: My husbands family have an oriental grocery shop and we import goods from all over Asia to sell.

lender.name: Stephen
lender.loan_because: I want to be able to help someone less well off than I am.

lender.name: Lee
lender.loan_because: I lend because it helps people make a difference in their lives for them self and it builds successful people all over the world.
lender.occupational_info: I work with Children and their parents.

lender.name: Keith
lender.loan_because: I believe in sharing.
lender.occupational_info: basic gardening (weeding, cutting grass, hedges) and political work too to build our one Motheroland: some of which you can read about on

lender.name: Kathy
lender.loan_because: I want to share what I have with others. Everyone needs a helping hand at times, and this is a chance to offer one.

lender.name: Khan Family
lender.loan_because: So people can do the things they want to do and make a success of themselves.

lender.name: Ben
lender.loan_because: Like to try and give people an opporytunity to improve their lives.

lender.name: Dan
lender.loan_because: my reason for being with KIVA is-help someone to fish and they feed themselves for life!
lender.occupational_info: working in and for my local community, friends -and waiting for my wife to retire!

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I like to help others who do not have the advantages we are accustomed to.
lender.occupational_info: I help employees understand their insurance and retirement plans.

lender.name: Edo
lender.loan_because: It is easy for me now and one day I might need a loan myself.
lender.occupational_info: I make maps to prevent floods, find water, and prevent water pollution form killing animals and salt water from killing plants.

lender.name: Beth and Brooke
lender.occupation: Non-profit fundraiser and 9 year old girl
lender.loan_because: My god daughter, Brooke, and I decided to give a loan to help those that are in need. I live in New York City and Brooke lives in Connecticut.
lender.occupational_info: I work in fundraising for a non-profit organization and Brooke works hard in school. She is in the 3rd grade.

lender.name: Jacob Fan
lender.loan_because: I want to help others to improve their life and realize their dreams.

lender.name: Ruth
lender.loan_because: I believe it will make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: Organising and empowering people to unite and stand up for their rights.

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: Why not! I have a great family and all i need.

lender.name: Sunshine
lender.loan_because: I am so blessed with all that has been given to me! There is great joy in giving and sharing with others!

lender.name: Jen & Steve
lender.loan_because: We loan because we have recently returned from world tour and have been shocked by the poverty endured by people in so many parts of the world. Yet more importantly we were impressed & amazed by the resourcefulness, the work ethic & the commitment shown by these people to improving their situations for future generations.
lender.occupational_info: Numbers, numbers & more numbers

lender.name: Taneo
lender.loan_because: I want to reward your dream of entrepreneur in your country. I do hope that you will succeed !
lender.occupational_info: I am running a small consulting firm. So I am also an entrepreneur here.

lender.name: Akiko
lender.loan_because: I want

lender.name: blue jay Miles
lender.occupational_info: I want to let a business succeed with many people

lender.name: Allison
lender.loan_because: I want to help others who are less fortunate than I and also it is the right thing to do. This is a birthday gift from my uncle and he is teaching me to be charitable and help others.
lender.occupational_info: I am a 7th grader in Santa Clara, California.

lender.name: Brianna
lender.loan_because: I loan because people need help.
lender.occupational_info: I don't work.

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: This is what we gave as wedding gifts to the party- a gift that will live on and on.

lender.name: Kazuyuki
lender.loan_because: to make this world a little bit easier place to live.
lender.occupational_info: making this world a little bit boring place to live.

lender.name: Melodee
lender.loan_because: I want to care for the people that Jesus cares for.
lender.occupational_info: I work with youth, children, and families in a church

lender.name: Wirat
lender.loan_because: I was on of them when I was a kid. Live like the other was one of my childhood dreams. So, I want to be a small part to make their dreams come true. Thanks to Kiva.
lender.occupational_info: I am a representation base in Thailand for The Max Foundation - US Non-profit Cancer Organization, mission to improving the lives and survival rates of patients with blood-related cancers.

lender.name: Damon
lender.loan_because: we've all needed help at one time or another

lender.name: Ibrahim O Jalloh
lender.occupation: Kiva Coordinator for Salone Microfinance Trust
lender.occupational_info: I work with Kiva to post interesting borrower profiles and journals for the Kiva Lender community.

lender.name: Al Stewart
lender.loan_because: Making a loan to a business owner is like planting a seed in fertile ground. A lot of good comes from that.
lender.occupational_info: I am self-employed in the online business of making photo gifts. Customers send their photos to me and I make acrylic photo sculptures from them. What a fun business it is! I ship to USA and APO/FPO addresses.

lender.name: Alyson
lender.loan_because: I believe it creates a better world
lender.occupational_info: I make nonprofits run more effectively by consulting, teaching, and providing information at www.BoardsThatExcel.com.

lender.name: Ravi
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in the lives of others who don't have the opportunities that I have had in my life.
lender.occupational_info: I start new businesses.

lender.name: Neil
lender.loan_because: I'm inspired! As human beings, we must help each other.

lender.name: Tessa
lender.loan_because: I believe in this program and I am forturnate that life allows me to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I am passionate about Women's justice issues.

lender.name: Pastor patricia
lender.loan_because: I want this world to understand we all serve one God and he wants to BLESS everyone
lender.occupational_info: I live in an area where hurricane KATRINA ravaged the area,Their are thousands of homeless children and moms,i help the them but i need a better ,smaller car to get to them their are so many.What you see on TV about New Orleans is a lie its not back, people are homeless and no food its really sad.I go out and bring food and blankets and clothes to these people but they need so much more.

lender.name: Kelly
lender.loan_because: I would hope that people would do the same for me if I was in need
lender.occupational_info: I am a zoology student

lender.name: M&M
lender.loan_because: We want to promote justice and opportunity around the world.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: Microfinance allows me to directly help people across the world.
lender.occupational_info: I promote free market solutions to social problems in Minnesota.

lender.name: Cardenas Family
lender.loan_because: helping others should be the cornerstone of every family...

lender.name: Donna
lender.loan_because: I care.
lender.occupational_info: My work is easy

lender.name: Georgia
lender.loan_because: The feeling you get when, a good deed is done- is irreplacable. And I truly believe that everyone in the world has a soft spot in thier heart where love can be found for everyone. No matter what gender, size, shape, or color.
lender.occupational_info: I actually have a few more years before "job time" I am 11 years old but my concerns about the world and people around me are just as strong.

lender.name: Gilbert
lender.loan_because: my crazy aunt Karen sent gift certificate so i started and now i feel less gulity about destroying the enviroment ect.
lender.occupational_info: :) discombobulated.

lender.name: Shelli
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed with more than I need and want to make a difference in the lives of others.

lender.name: Becki
lender.loan_because: I've been blessed and would like to share those blessings with others.
lender.occupational_info: I am an assistant to a Family Court judge. We help families and children.

lender.name: gregory
lender.loan_because: i want to
lender.occupational_info: i work in online marketing and feel that the world should do more for those that do not have

lender.name: FoundationStudio.ca
lender.loan_because: I have a crazy passion for entrepreneurship and believe everyone should experience the thrill of starting, molding and achieving the results that owning a small business can bring.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Social Entrepreneur, specializing in celebrating all things life has to offer. Owning a Small Business promotion company allows me to help my clients celebrate life, occasions and their business successes.

lender.name: Hilary
lender.loan_because: its quick, its easy and its life-changing. its also exciting to log on to the kiva website and see what's happening with loans all over the world.

lender.name: Nicki
lender.loan_because: I believe in assisting those who help themselves. I believe that by seeing their neighbors succeed, it will spur others on to be entrepreneurial, and thus make a better live for themselves, their family, and society.
lender.occupational_info: I have a group of online websites that are set up to sell affiliate products as well as my own, and also informational sites that will help others succeed with their online businesses.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: I want to help others succeed.

lender.name: Dennis Walcker
lender.occupational_info: biologist and builder Currently working on a Built Green , Energy Star projects

lender.name: Tim
lender.loan_because: I believe we can all make a difference no matter how small.
lender.occupational_info: I make sure the doctors in my hospital have all the medical information necessary to treat their patients.

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: The difference in living standards between myself and 95 percent of the world's population is astounding. Through these micro-loans I hope to help reduce that gap.

lender.name: Bill
lender.loan_because: I want to help people better their lives and the lives of others.
lender.occupational_info: I raise money to help people in my community with their medical expenses.

lender.name: Jeroen van der Meer
lender.occupational_info: IT Professional

lender.name: Little Boo
lender.loan_because: it's important to contribute to the realization of hopes and dreams.
lender.occupational_info: Growing up.

lender.name: Andy & Mel
lender.loan_because: I want to share some of the blessings I've been given.
lender.occupational_info: My family and I live in Vernon, BC. My wife and I work at the Vernon Christian School.

lender.name: Kimberly
lender.loan_because: we are all responsible for the difference we can make.

lender.name: Margaret
lender.loan_because: My first loan was a gift from a friend and an introduction to Kiva. I'm thrilled to participate in this lending program, and hope I will have the opportunity to reloan and add to the my lending amount.
lender.occupational_info: I teach children and community members about clean water and environmentally sound practices that protect public health and the environment.

lender.name: Colleen
lender.loan_because: I would like to help people offer important services within their own communities.
lender.occupational_info: I have been working in hospitals since I was 18. I went to college and graduate school to study hospital administration. I now work for a company that owns over 175 hospitals throughout the United States.

lender.name: Kathy
lender.loan_because: My son gave me a Kiva gift certificate for Mother's Day! He has taught me so much about being aware of others in need outside of this country, and the way we can all help, even in small ways.

lender.name: AndersonSVF
lender.occupational_info: A group of UCLA Anderson students making microloans

lender.name: Buck
lender.loan_because: KIVA is a no frills organization and I like it that 100% of my loans go to the person or group I pick.
lender.occupational_info: I audit businesses and charities like KIVA.

lender.name: Karen & Orla
lender.occupation: Realtor & Broker Associate, San Carlos, CA
lender.loan_because: Without hope and the promise of a better day, the human spirit feels defeated. If we can plant the seeds of hope with our modest contributions, we believe creativity and invention will be born and flourish. We leave you with this powerful thought: "The test of our progress is not whether we add more to the abundance of those who have much; it is whether we provide enough for those who have too little." Franklin D. Roosevelt
lender.occupational_info: As residential Realtors on the San Francisco Mid-Peninsula, our unwavering objective is to provide the highest level of skill, expertise and unsurpassed service to our clients. Earning their trust is an honor and privilege and, the reward is the invaluable gift of life-long relationships.

lender.name: Kathleen
lender.loan_because: I am learning about microfinance and I want to find out if my small contribution will help someone overseas. This may be the most direct way to determine that. I also chose to loan to a woman in Ghana because I love the people of Ghana and miss my friends there!
lender.occupational_info: I am learning how the U.S. government can serve its people.

lender.name: Carrie
lender.loan_because: Small things are often done out of great love.
lender.occupational_info: I work with adults who have committed crimes and been found to suffer from serious mental illnesses, such as Schizophrenia.

lender.name: shannon
lender.loan_because: I want to help people reach their dreams. I own my own business, and have been so grateful to have people help me along the way. I want to give back and help someone now.
lender.occupational_info: I own a hair salon, I also sell jewerly there.

lender.name: Grant
lender.loan_because: We all need to do our bit to help others.
lender.occupational_info: HR consultant and recent social business start up principal through coffeecauses.com.au

lender.name: Jay
lender.loan_because: I love people
lender.occupational_info: Missionary for Jesus Christ!

lender.name: Hayley
lender.loan_because: I feel it is a smart way to benefit people (and their families) who really need a helping hand
lender.occupational_info: I look at the way a business does something (a task), and determine how to improve it - like finding ways to increase staff productivity or a cheaper way to do it.

lender.name: Robin
lender.loan_because: I want to help someone for whom a small sum from my "plenty" will give her the capital investment needed to provide for her family and by extension, contribute to her community.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a large law firm, primarily with residential real estate closings (when people buy a home to live in) and small business loan closings (when people need a bank loan to invest in their business).

lender.name: Kaori
lender.loan_because: i agree this idea- Kiva, told me the use of wastes in the world.

lender.name: patricia&steve
lender.loan_because: To empower someone who is eager to make progress in their life for themselves and their family.
lender.occupational_info: My husband sells parts for car tire repairs and I do his paperwork.

lender.name: Brett & Wendy
lender.loan_because: We loan because we believe in these people and want to give them support to have their own successful business and have a better life for themselves & their families.

lender.name: Sasha
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance to live independently and with respect.
lender.occupational_info: I look for the genetic basis of human disease

lender.name: Rowena
lender.loan_because: I believe we are the difference we want to see in the world. I myself am only 1 generation removed from these entrepreneurs, as my own Mother was born in India and lucky enough to be sponsored by a lovely Australian lady. This enabled her to get a good education in nursing and through her own hard work improve her life and that of her family. I believe we can all make a difference! Oh did i mention that already? lol!

lender.name: Oliver Warburton
lender.loan_because: it makes me happy.

lender.name: Melissa
lender.loan_because: I believe that one person CAN make a difference. It is amazing that lending such a small amount of money can make such a difference in someone else's life. I love lending!
lender.occupational_info: I am a full-time college student persuing a degree in Elementary Education. I also work at Starbucks Coffee Company.

lender.name: Chris&Teresa
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance.

lender.name: Wendy
lender.loan_because: I just want to help make someones life become easier and have more money to aid their living conditions and help their children become educated.
lender.occupational_info: I teach 5 year and 6 year old children to read, write and learn maths, act out stories, exercise through games and have lots of fun learning.

lender.name: eddie
lender.loan_because: I found out about micro credit by watching a film about Yunnis and the Grameen Bank and was convinced this was a wonderful way to begin to alleviate poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I teach history and philosophy to high school students in the United States.

lender.name: Syd - Melb, Australia
lender.loan_because: I want to be able to help make a difference to those in need

lender.name: Julianne
lender.loan_because: a small amount of my wage can make a real difference to someone else's life.

lender.name: Helen of Troy
lender.loan_because: To give people hope and drive to succeed on their own terms, not by receiving handouts. Why leave money sitting in a Paypal account serving no one?
lender.occupational_info: work in an office

lender.name: Chiko
lender.loan_because: I like this system. Cool!
lender.occupational_info: I am working for developing countries in the field of sustainable development and education.

lender.name: Koko
lender.loan_because: I like to help people become self-sufficient.
lender.occupational_info: Hmm. I am just an average housecat who believes we should all do our best to help others get along in the world.

lender.name: Vicki
lender.loan_because: I think each of us can make a difference. What goes around comes around.

lender.name: Melissa
lender.loan_because: I too have a small business and know how hard it is to get started without some help.
lender.occupational_info: I help companies find the right people and I help good candidates find jobs.

lender.loan_because: Help yourself ! Then People will help you, and your God will bless you.
lender.occupational_info: Engineer

lender.loan_because: it gives people the opportunity to exit poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I analyse the financial statements of large organizations.

lender.loan_because: I am in the fortunate position to be able to help those who are trying to help themselves
lender.occupational_info: I work for the government of Victoria in the public service. I serve the public.

lender.loan_because: I want to spread the love of Christ and the freedom of capitalism.

lender.name: val and mike
lender.loan_because: giving people the opportunity to work is the best way to help and educate their families and break the poverty cycle

lender.name: Hocker Christmas Fund
lender.loan_because: Our family has a raffle each Christmas Eve with the gifts we bring. The money collected is used for charity.

lender.name: Emily
lender.loan_because: I believe in paying it forward.

lender.name: Dale
lender.loan_because: It's a great idea
lender.occupational_info: Health provider.

lender.loan_because: I'm a business owner just doing my part to give back to the community.
lender.occupational_info: I"m just like you. I buy and sell products.

lender.loan_because: I am lucky enough to be able to.
lender.occupational_info: Everyday, I focus on taking care of the people I love most; and every night, I do some freelance design for a hobby.

lender.loan_because: I can see the difference my small amounts of money make to someone in another country.

lender.name: PeggyEllen & Rich
lender.loan_because: to be of service
lender.occupational_info: I, PeggyEllen, help people who need a nurse to come to their home & Rich writes about natural resources

lender.name: Mr. B
lender.loan_because: I would like my class to see the potential positive impact that $25 can have on people's lives around the world.
lender.occupational_info: I am a teacher with 27 students in the 4th Grade (about 10 years old). In addition to teaching Math, Reading, etc. I like to share ideas that may broaden my student's horizons a little. I hope to do this with KIVA.

lender.loan_because: It's my drop of goodwill
lender.occupational_info: I test computersoftware

lender.loan_because: Because I want to help

lender.occupational_info: I am currently studying business at a university in the United States.

lender.name: Tatsuo
lender.loan_because: I feel this system is one of the brilliant ways to help the people who want to work and have a will to make better of their life by themselves.

lender.name: steven
lender.loan_because: life is about giving
lender.occupational_info: nothing compare to alot of people

lender.name: Andrea
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Paulina
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves for their dream to become a reality. Every penny counts & it's great to give back & help.
lender.occupational_info:
I create Marketing, Personal, Visual Material, such as Business Cards, Promotional flyers, Web advertisement, Magazine Ads, Web Graphics, any digital or press ready layouts.
I also retouch & manipulate photographs.
I enjoy my work it allows me to be flexible, creative, dedicated & truly showcase my passion.

lender.name: Jenn
lender.loan_because: I like supporting various charities where I can, and what I like about this one is that it is helping people to help themselves and my money can keep on helping over and over again if I keep re-lending it.

lender.name: Yoshio
lender.loan_because: it's a good cause and great idea

lender.name: Neil
lender.loan_because: I think microloans are an excellent way of creating sustainable communities, and allow me to invest some of my earnings in a way which can help others.
lender.occupational_info: I help to support the use of computing to improve the quality and accessibility of research.

lender.name: Frenkieb
lender.loan_because: I care.

lender.name: paul
lender.occupation: Group Advertising Manager - Street Press Media
lender.loan_because: I can make a difference to someone else's life...
lender.occupational_info: I manage a team of advertising sales executives who sell ad space in local street press entertainment magazines. and love it...

lender.name: Tracey
lender.loan_because: by sheer luck, being born in Australia makes us rich beyond the dreams of many others. I feel we have a responsibility to help if we are able. Plus it feels sooooooo good.

lender.name: Ritesh

lender.loan_because: It is important to help those who are working to help themselves.

lender.name: Landon
lender.loan_because: I want to live the cliché: "be the change you want to see in the world". Rather than leaving money in a bank account accumulating marginal interest, I would rather help people across the world rise above poverty. For those of you not already involved and who are interested in learning more about micro-finance, you can check out: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Microfinance http://www.microfinancegateway.org
lender.occupational_info: I am still figuring out my life, but in the meantime I do business intelligence engineering/information worker consulting.

lender.name: James&Penelope
lender.loan_because: We live with HOPE . . .

lender.name: Nathalie
lender.loan_because: I believe there are situations where this can make a big difference in one's life. A small effort on my side that will have a possibly positive output. I don't wish to lend money to businesses involving alcohool because I often witness that alcohool causes violence and malformations during childbearing.
lender.occupational_info: I have been a feng shui consultant since 2001 and I own my business. I'm devoted to creating places where people live and work in the best possible ways.

lender.name: José
lender.loan_because: a welfare-based approach is the first way to improve the citizen proximity.
lender.occupational_info: Storyteller, TV journalist, e-Learning enabler, network facilitator, matchmaker, connector, speaker, community manager

lender.loan_because: I want to use my wealth to encourage workers in the third world to go forwards with their enterprises.
lender.occupational_info: I retired from working as a teacher a few years ago and I maintain our house and cook while my wife works as a teacher.

lender.name: Gail
lender.loan_because: my children know I love to support good causes, and they gave me a KIVA gift certificate for Mothers Day. I thought it was a wonderful gift!! We love to travel, and are very much aware of the beautiful people in the world that are perfectly willing to work, but may just need an opportunity. We are thankful to be able to partnership with them.
lender.occupational_info: My husband is a builder, and I work as an office manager at a dental office.

lender.name: Troco Kaan
lender.loan_because: I care

lender.name: Bill
lender.occupational_info: I teach literature and writing in college.

lender.name: Prince Family
lender.loan_because: God has blessed us so much with the freedom to pursue capitalism in the USA, we want to do what we can to help others achieve their own freedom and success in other areas.
lender.occupational_info: I help entrepreneurs with innovative product ideas protect their inventions with patents.

lender.name: Margaret

lender.name: Tahir

lender.name: zsazsa
lender.loan_because: My personal goal is to help women in business to better their lives and that of their families.
lender.occupational_info: I own and operate a guided horeback riding adventure company. I am also a coach and healer uniting with humans with horses to heal.

lender.name: Holly
lender.loan_because: I'm a women with a small coffee roasting business. The coffee I buy isn't able to be fair trade so I give back to countries that it comes from and help to support other women like me running their own small business.

lender.name: Piia
lender.occupational_info: I teach at a university

lender.name: Jeremy
lender.occupation: CEO of an Internet Company: CitiesUnlimited.com

lender.name: Ingraham Economics
lender.loan_because: As a class, we have studied the impacts of microloans on less developed nations of the world. Many of us got a chance to go see Muhammad Yunus speak at the University of Washington this year and were moved by the simplicity of his approach. We wanted to do something after two years together as a class and decided to try and raise money to loan "person to person" though Kiva. We were lucky to make the aquaintance of Professor Yoram Bauman (of the University of Washington - www.standupdeconomist.com) and he agreed to give a performance as the world's only standup economist at our school. He did this free of charge and we are quite thankful to him. We raised $1,050 in donations from the evening's event.
lender.occupational_info: Besides the teacher, we are all students who will be going to different colleges and universities around the world next fall. Presently, we are finishing up at Ingraham High School in Seattle.

lender.name: Tim F.
lender.loan_because:
It's the right thing to do.
I read something, somewhere that, "...world poverty is one of the most offensive things we can do to God..."
Helping people establish and maintain their own dignity in this life is paramount to my beliefs in evolution.
One of my intentions in this life is to do my part to create peace and dignity in this world.
"May the Peace of God be with you" - St. Francis of Assisi.
lender.occupational_info: My work is Financial Analysis, having said that, it's probably boring to most. I track, forecast, maintain and establish multi-million dollar budgets. It is rewarding in the aspect of challenge, but it doesn't provide much people interaction.

lender.name: Sune K.
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Nadine
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Ray
lender.loan_because: We are called to serve one another.

lender.occupational_info: I own and manage a private educational academy in Seoul, South Korea.

lender.name: Kirsten
lender.loan_because: It's the collective of the little things we do in life that make the most difference. And, I want to leave this world a better place for my children and yours.
lender.occupational_info: I help my busy clients to do things that they don't have the time or knowledge to do themselves.

lender.loan_because: Our family is committed to repairing our world (tzedakah). Bob (our dad) runs a non-profit that helps people in the Third World. Alexi (our mom) is government attorney. Bekah and Jacob (our children) have traveled around the world and care about what happens to those who are less fortunate.
lender.occupational_info: Check out Bob's non-profit: www.ewh.org to see what Bob is up to. We're very proud of him!

I think 'as people get better,the world gets much better.''
…(soory for my poor English skill)

lender.loan_because: I feel that the money returns to Kiva to make more loans, So far I have made 28 loans of $25 each with an initial output of $175

lender.name: Andy and Lacie
lender.loan_because: We're all in this together.

lender.name: Lynne
lender.loan_because: I want to support people to give life a go, and change their way of life. To support their families and feel proud of their achivements
lender.occupational_info: I support people in their work and home life. Make sure they are safe in their workplace.

lender.name: Stacy
lender.loan_because: I want to help women gain the power to provide for themselves and their families.
lender.occupational_info: I work in an office that develops and implements programs to improve women's leadership skills. We coordinate conferences and meetings that educate and empower women to take a leading role in their communities.

lender.name: Alec
lender.loan_because: I'm always beaking off about how I'd like to help and how I wished there was a way for me to help without some crumby tinpot dictator taking / wrecking the effort. KIVA answers this issue by providing a direct hand up instead of a hand out thereby creating positive change through empowerment.
lender.occupational_info: I find innovative ways to finance / find sources of financing for my company

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: it helps empower the borrowers to create a better world ....but expect them to have the pride and courtesy to repay their loans punctually !!!

lender.name: Lissa
lender.loan_because: I want to do something to help others. I am especially interested in helping women whose daily work is often not counted as part of the economic equation, but who contribute an enormous amount to their families and communities.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a communications consultant helping businesses with communications strategy/ planning and content development. My background is in publishing and communications with a focus on social marketing and social media marketing.

lender.name: Steve
lender.occupational_info: I sell international tours to teachers and their students.

lender.name: Melanie
lender.loan_because: When you give from your heart, it's the greatest gift you can give. All donations are in memory of our beautiful son, Carson Warner Kennedy, who died in 2005. He inspired us to give.
lender.occupational_info: I publish magazines & also own a media company that produces commercials, music videos, TV & Film projects. Many other people helped me get started so I want to support other entrepreneurs around the world!

lender.name: Samit
lender.occupational_info: Owner and operator of a few hotels.

lender.name: Manny & Stacey
lender.loan_because: We enjoy helping people to better themselves. Everyone needs help from time to time.
lender.occupational_info: Manny provides customer support by using technical skills and Stacey prepares young students for the future.

lender.name: Bennie
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I work to protect our natural spaces for future generations,

lender.name: Yayoi
lender.loan_because: I was moved very much when I knew this idea. May the people all over the world be happy !

lender.name: Heather
lender.loan_because: its a good thing to do
lender.occupational_info: I sell land

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: I feel that I'm more fortunate than a lot of people in the world. The least that I can do is loan them money to get started. The 'trickle-down' theory that the world bank and many first world countries believe is not helping those who really need it and are only supplying the elite in those impoverished countries. This is my way of making a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I go to school everyday and row in the afternoons. :-)

lender.name: Katie
lender.loan_because: Though I don't have much, I am blessed with more than I need to survive, and I want to see people do something more purposeful with $25 than I ever could spending it on myself.
lender.occupational_info: I tutor kids and get them involved in student-initiated community service-learning projects.

lender.name: Wayde
lender.loan_because: it helps.

lender.name: Eli Belda
lender.loan_because: Me with my disabled I.T. friend wanted to register our service offered business to prospective clients that requires us to provide permits and licenses to perform the contracted project works. Our offered service or proposals simply rejected due to lacking services license and permits. We also wanted to have a second hand computer desktop for us to perform the project task, to rent a small space with one telephone line. After we set-up the business, my next plan is to help jobless and skilled professionals to work with us , earned some training and simply receive also income for a living.
lender.occupational_info: I am working as freelance service provider specializes in bookkeeping and computer programming system development for business processes such as payroll system, billing system, inventory system, etc. My skills requires more in providing business process solutions to my clients needs.

lender.name: Mandy
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of helping people who normally wouldn't have access to a loan

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: the world is small and every thing anyone can do to bring it closer and the differences smaller needs to be done. One person CAN make a difference.

lender.name: Corentin
lender.loan_because: I care, I love entrepreneurship, I want to help
lender.occupational_info: I'm handling the online promotion for major Hip-hop artists. I am the General Manager of an online community counting 400+K members

lender.name: Grahame
lender.loan_because: I was introduced to Kiva while I was doing a course on the net. I liked what I saw and decided to lend a very modest sum. The idea appeals to me in that money is lent to people who are trying to improve their lives and I am glad that I am able to assist in a small way. The idea of lending money rather than giving appealed to me. I will continue to re-lend the money as it becomes available. A fabulous idea all round!

lender.name: Donna
lender.loan_because: I am grateful for what I have in life and appreciate it every day. If I can make a small positive difference to someone else's life - fantastic!
lender.occupational_info: In Vietnam in 2008 I was embarrassed by my career, trying to explain to someone who works in the fields all day and has very little to eat. I am a Personal Trainer.......

lender.name: Syd
lender.loan_because: I believe helping people help themselves, empowers them and enhances their dignity.

lender.name: Kay
lender.loan_because: I am inspired by the difference it can make.
lender.occupational_info: I help refugees who have come to Australia with bringing their relatives to join them.

lender.name: Wout

lender.occupational_info: I'm a webdesigner.

lender.occupational_info: had small bussinessis then sold and now sell houses
